column1: In  the  period  from  January  to  December  2022,  Sri  Lanka's  top  five  international  tourist
markets  were  India,  Russia,  the  United  Kingdom,  Germany,  and  France.  India  was  the
largest contributor  of  tourists, accounting  for  17.1% of  the  total traffic.  Russia  followed
closely  with  12.7%,  while  the  United  Kingdom,  Germany,  and  France  accounted  for
11.8%,  7.7%,  and  4.9%  respectively.  Notably,  Canada  and  Poland  also  appeared  among
the top source markets, compared  to the previous  year.
